code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={giftCardId:"",giftCardAmount:"",giftCardDate:""};var GiftCardSlice=createSlice({name:'giftcard',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setGiftCard:{reducer:function reducer(state,action){var newState={giftCardId:action.payload.giftCardId,giftCardAmount:action.payload.giftCardAmount,giftCardDate:action.payload.giftCardDate};console.log("newState",newState);return newState;}},deleteGiftCard:function deleteGiftCard(state){return initialState;}}});var _GiftCardSlice$action=GiftCardSlice.actions,setGiftCard=_GiftCardSlice$action.setGiftCard,deleteGiftCard=_GiftCardSlice$action.deleteGiftCard;export{setGiftCard,deleteGiftCard};export default GiftCardSlice.reducer;
